member.name: T:NokLib.EnumStringifier
member.summary: Class for converting enums to strings, works by caching all enum string values in a dictionary. While slightly slower than regular ToString method (~+7 ns/op), this class does not generate any garbage during conversion

member.name: M:NokLib.EnumStringifier.ToString``1(``0)
member.summary: Converts the enum to string, creates a conversion table if the enum is being converted for the first time

member.name: M:NokLib.EnumStringifier.GetNames``1
member.summary: Returns names of each enum value.

member.name: M:NokLib.EnumStringifier.Release``1
member.summary: Release resources occupied by a conversion table for enum of type T. Useful for usage with large enums

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPool`1.#ctor(System.Func{`0},System.Action{`0},System.Action{`0},System.Action{`0},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new ObjectPool
member.param: Function for allocating new objects, if not specified new instances will be created using the Activator.CreateInstance method
Gets called when an object is rented
Gets called when an object is released
Used for disposal of the object
The maximum allowed capacity of the pool
How many objects to preallocate whent the pool is created
Prevents an object from being returned twice

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPoolBase`1.Get
member.summary: Get a pooled instance of the object, if no allocated instance is available, a new instance is allocated. If there are no allocated instances left and the pools capacity has been reached, a LimitReachedException is thrown

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPoolBase`1.SafeGet
member.summary: Get a pooled instance of the object wrapped in PooledObject, use with the 'using' keyword for the object to be automatically released

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPoolBase`1.TryGet(`0@)
member.summary: Attempt to get a pooled instance of the object, if no allocated instance is available, a new instance is allocated.
member.returns: False if a new instance needs to be allocated, but pools capacity has been reached. Otherwise returns true

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPoolBase`1.TrySafeGet(NokLib.Pooling.PooledObject{`0}@)
member.summary: Try to get a pooled instance of the object wrapped in PooledObject, use with the 'using' keyword for the object to be automatically released

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPoolBase`1.Release(`0)
member.summary: Releases the object back to the pool, if DuplicateChecking is enabled and the object has already been released a DuplicateObjectInCollectionException is thrown
member.param: The object to be released

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPoolBase`1.Clear(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calls the OnDispose method (if specified) for each allocated object and clears the pool.
member.param: Should the Dispose method be called if the object implements IDisposable interface?

member.name: M:NokLib.Pooling.ObjectPoolBase`1.HasBeenReturned(`0)
member.summary: Has the object been returned already?
